ch0049_40_fuyo/0101_0701_01_10:
Ahaha! We were all waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0049_40_fuyo/0101_0701_02_10:
It’s more lively than usual around here tonight.
How exciting!
ch0049_40_fuyo/7101_0701_01_10:
So many sync pairs are out and about in their
costumes because of the festival.
ch0049_40_fuyo/7101_0701_02_10: Some of them really go all out.
ch0049_40_fuyo/7101_0701_03_10:
I’ve seen costumes so well made, it’s hard to tell
they’re a costume.
ch0049_40_fuyo/7102_0701_01_10: How’s my outfit? Does it suit me?
ch0049_40_fuyo/7103_0701_01_10: What do you think it’s like inside Cofagrigus?
ch0049_40_fuyo/7103_0701_02_10: I hear it’s actually quite spacious and comfortable.
ch0049_40_fuyo/7104_0701_01_10:
Everyone has a different relationship with
ghost Pokémon.
ch0049_40_fuyo/7104_0701_02_10: I’ve always thought of them as friends.
ch0049_40_fuyo/7104_0701_03_10:
So I’m glad to meet others on Pasio who think
the same!
ch0049_40_fuyo/7105_0701_01_10:
What does a bond mean to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0049_40_fuyo/7105_0701_02_10:
To me, it means getting along with another person
or Pokémon and getting to know them better.
ch0049_40_fuyo/7105_0701_03_10:
The more bonds you have, the better your
friendships!
ch0049_40_fuyo/7105_0701_04_10:
Bonds may not be visible, but they’re
super important!
ch0049_40_fuyo/1701_0701_01_10:
Cofagrigus collected a bunch of stuff. Let me
share some with you!
ch0049_40_fuyo/1701_0702_01_10:
Don’t be afraid to use it! It’ll make Cofagrigus
happy, too!
ch0049_40_fuyo/2501_0701_01_10:
The museum gets really lively at night.
It’s exciting!
ch0049_40_fuyo/2501_0701_02_10: I wonder if schools and libraries are like that, too.
ch0049_40_fuyo/2501_0701_03_10:
The busier the place is during the day, the more
“they” come around at night!
ch0049_40_fuyo/2501_0702_01_10: Hm? There shouldn’t be anyone at night, you say?
ch0049_40_fuyo/2501_0702_02_10: I’m sure you’ll understand if you see them!
ch0049_40_fuyo/2511_0701_01_10:
If a ghost Pokémon pops out and scares you,
don’t get upset, OK?
ch0049_40_fuyo/2511_0701_02_10: A lot of them are timid and frighten easily.
ch0049_40_fuyo/2511_0701_03_10: If you encounter one, be sure to smile!
ch0049_40_fuyo/2511_0701_04_10: That’ll make them warm up to you!
ch0049_40_fuyo/2511_0702_01_10:
You’re friends with all kinds of sync pairs, so you’ll
have no trouble befriending them, too!
ch0049_40_fuyo/2511_0702_02_10: Just show them that smile of yours!
ch0049_40_fuyo/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! I hope today lets me deepen my bond
with you and everyone else!
ch0049_40_fuyo/3003_0701_01_10:
I guess the ghost Pokémon are still asleep. But I’m
busy getting ready for a fun evening.
ch0049_40_fuyo/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s such a quiet evening, but if you listen
carefully... There! You can hear their voices!
